name: ganbaru-video-generator
description: 毎日の頑張りを共有するインタラクティブ動画自動生成システム

scripts.daily:morning: npm run render:morning && npm run upload:youtube -- --type morning
scripts.daily:night: npm run render:night && npm run upload:youtube -- --type night
scripts.daily:summary: npm run fetch:comments && npm run render:summary && npm run upload:youtube -- --type summary
